initialize(address,address,uint256,uint1.custom:error: Throw InvalidAddress if any of the address is invalid

params.alphaDenominator_: denominator of alpha. If alpha is 0.5 then denominator is 2. alpha is alphaNumerator_/alphaDenominator_. So, 0 < alpha < 1
params.alphaNumerator_: numerator of alpha. If alpha is 0.5 then numerator is 1. alphaDenominator_ must be greater than alphaNumerator_, alphaDenominator_ cannot be zero and alphaNumerator_ cannot be zero
params.loopsLimit_: Maximum number of loops allowed in a single transaction

returns._0: isPrimeHolder true if user is a prime holder

params.users: list of address to issue tokens to

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAccessControlManager(address).details: Admin function to set address of AccessControlManager

params.accessControlManager_: The new address of the AccessControlManager

setLimit(uint256,uint256).custom:error: Throw InvalidLimit if any of the limit is less than total tokens minted

params._irrevocableLimit: total number of irrevocable tokens that can be minted
params._revocableLimit: total number of revocable tokens that can be minted

setStakedAt(address[],uint256[]).custom:error: Throw InvalidLength if users and timestamps length are not equal
setStakedAt(address[],uint256[]).custom:event: Emits StakedAtUpdated event for each user

params.timestamps: new staked at timestamp for the users
params.users: accounts for which we need to update staked at timestamp

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

params._alphaDenominator: denominator of alpha. If alpha is 0.5 then denominator is 2
params._alphaNumerator: numerator of alpha. If alpha is 0.5 then numerator is 1

updateMultipliers(address,uint256,uint25.custom:error: Throw MarketNotSupported if market is not supported

params.borrowMultiplier: new borrow multiplier for the market, scaled by 1e18
params.supplyMultiplier: new supply multiplier for the market, scaled by 1e18

updateScores(address[]).custom:error: Throw NoScoreUpdatesRequired if no score updates are requiredThrow UserHasNoPrimeToken if user has no prime token

params.users: accounts for which we need to update score

params.user: the account address whose balance was updated
